p: However, to date, the most promising antiviral drug able to fighting COVID-19 is the nucleotide prodrug remdesivir (GS-5734). This drug, recently involved in four phase III clinical trials in China and United States [ 25], has a broad spectrum of antiviral activities against RNA viruses like filoviruses, paramyxoviruses, pneumoviruses, SARS and MERS coronavirus [ 10].
